languages.text: "Именно поэтому процедура была проведена без вашего ведома. О вашей нездоровой привязанности к кибермастифу есть заметка в личном деле. Я убедила маршала, что это в ваших же интересах, проктор".

"That is precisely why the procedure was performed without your knowledge. There is a note in your personnel file about your unhealthy attachment to the cyber-mastiff. I persuaded the Marshal that it was in your best interests, Proctor."
languages.original_text: "Именно поэтому процедура была проведена без вашего ведома. О вашей нездоровой привязанности к кибермастифу есть заметка в личном деле. Я убедила маршала, что это в ваших же интересах, проктор".

traits.locale_text: "That is precisely why the procedure was performed without your knowledge. There is a note in your personnel file about your unhealthy attachment to the cyber-mastiff. I persuaded the Marshal that it was in your best interests, Proctor."

"That is precisely why the procedure was performed without your knowledge. There is a note in your personnel file about your unhealthy attachment to the cyber-mastiff. I persuaded the Marshal that it was in your best interests, Proctor."

"That is precisely why the procedure was performed without your knowledge. There is a note in your personnel file about your unhealthy attachment to the cyber-mastiff. I persuaded the Marshal that it was in your best interests, Proctor."

"That is precisely why the procedure was performed without your knowledge. There is a note in your personnel file about your unhealthy attachment to the cyber-mastiff. I persuaded the Marshal that it was in your best interests, Proctor."

languages.text: "Aus genau diesem Grund erfolgte das Prozedere ohne Euer Wissen. In Eurer Akte gibt es einen Vermerk hinsichtlich Eurer ungesunden Zuneigung für den Cyber-Mastiff. Ich habe den Marschall überzeugt, dass es in Eurem besten Interesse war, Proktor."
languages.original_text: "That is precisely why the procedure was performed without your knowledge. There is a note in your personnel file about your unhealthy attachment to the cyber-mastiff. I persuaded the Marshal that it was in your best interests, Proctor."

traits.locale_text: "Aus genau diesem Grund erfolgte das Prozedere ohne Euer Wissen. In Eurer Akte gibt es einen Vermerk hinsichtlich Eurer ungesunden Zuneigung für den Cyber-Mastiff. Ich habe den Marschall überzeugt, dass es in Eurem besten Interesse war, Proktor."

languages.text: « C'est précisément la raison pour laquelle cette procédure a été conduite à votre insu. Votre dossier personnel comporte une note au sujet de l'attachement malsain que vous témoignez au cyber-mastiff. J'ai persuadé le maréchal que cette démarche était dans votre intérêt, proctor. »
languages.original_text: "That is precisely why the procedure was performed without your knowledge. There is a note in your personnel file about your unhealthy attachment to the cyber-mastiff. I persuaded the Marshal that it was in your best interests, Proctor."

traits.locale_text: « C'est précisément la raison pour laquelle cette procédure a été conduite à votre insu. Votre dossier personnel comporte une note au sujet de l'attachement malsain que vous témoignez au cyber-mastiff. J'ai persuadé le maréchal que cette démarche était dans votre intérêt, proctor. »

languages.text: “正因如此，那场手术才会在你不知情的情况下进行。你的人事档案里面，其中有一条提到了你对生化獒犬依赖行为问题的记录。是我说服了元帅，让他明白这一切都是为了你好，监察官。”
languages.original_text: "That is precisely why the procedure was performed without your knowledge. There is a note in your personnel file about your unhealthy attachment to the cyber-mastiff. I persuaded the Marshal that it was in your best interests, Proctor."

traits.locale_text: “正因如此，那场手术才会在你不知情的情况下进行。你的人事档案里面，其中有一条提到了你对生化獒犬依赖行为问题的记录。是我说服了元帅，让他明白这一切都是为了你好，监察官。”

languages.text: «Por eso, precisamente, realizamos este procedimiento sin su conocimiento. Hay una nota en su archivo de personal sobre su apego excesivo al cibermastín. Convencí al Mariscal de que esto era lo mejor para usted, Procurador».
languages.original_text: "That is precisely why the procedure was performed without your knowledge. There is a note in your personnel file about your unhealthy attachment to the cyber-mastiff. I persuaded the Marshal that it was in your best interests, Proctor."

traits.locale_text: «Por eso, precisamente, realizamos este procedimiento sin su conocimiento. Hay una nota en su archivo de personal sobre su apego excesivo al cibermastín. Convencí al Mariscal de que esto era lo mejor para usted, Procurador».

languages.text: 「まさにその理由で、あなたの知らないうちにその手術は行われたのです。あなたの人事ファイルには、サイバーマスチフへの不健全な執着についての記録があります。代理人、あなたのためになると私が将帥を説得しました」
languages.original_text: "That is precisely why the procedure was performed without your knowledge. There is a note in your personnel file about your unhealthy attachment to the cyber-mastiff. I persuaded the Marshal that it was in your best interests, Proctor."

traits.locale_text: 「まさにその理由で、あなたの知らないうちにその手術は行われたのです。あなたの人事ファイルには、サイバーマスチフへの不健全な執着についての記録があります。代理人、あなたのためになると私が将帥を説得しました」

languages.text: "Prosedürün senin bilgin haricinde tutulması, tam da bu sebepten ötürüydü. Siber mastife karşı duyduğun bu hastalık derecesinde bağlılık, personel dosyana şerh düşülmüş zaten. Böylesinin herkes için daha iyi olacağına Miralay'ı ben ikna ettim Üsteğmen."
languages.original_text: "That is precisely why the procedure was performed without your knowledge. There is a note in your personnel file about your unhealthy attachment to the cyber-mastiff. I persuaded the Marshal that it was in your best interests, Proctor."

traits.locale_text: "Prosedürün senin bilgin haricinde tutulması, tam da bu sebepten ötürüydü. Siber mastife karşı duyduğun bu hastalık derecesinde bağlılık, personel dosyana şerh düşülmüş zaten. Böylesinin herkes için daha iyi olacağına Miralay'ı ben ikna ettim Üsteğmen."
